text: @Alyssa_Milano I play the division 2. It is a video game, it is not real but it represents the world (DC and NY) after viral infections and devastation. Idiots see this and movies about pandemics etc and think the apocalypse is next. Rumour going around COVID-19 makes zombies now too!
